about_the_game:
Mist Survivor is an action roguelite game. You take on the role of a character summoned by the Goddess, trapped in a time rift.
You need to use magical powers to fight against the monsters in the mist and survive the dangerous zone.

A follow-up of action rogulite Mist Slayer

Inherits most of the story and characters of the original game but with a different gameplay.
More refreshing experience based on the survivor roguelike genre.

Story

Chosen by the Goddess, you fight against the evil Mist invaders to save the world. However, you suddenly fall into a time rift, constantly shuttling between different strange places.
The enemies you once defeated have also been resurrected, pouring in like a tide. You see a mysterious Merchant. He tells you that if you want to return to the normal world, you must defeat these monsters and obtain clues.
You still retain the talent to control the power of the five elements, and the merchant will provide you with more powerful abilities.

Gameplay

  • Control characters with different classes to fight against enemies, automatically release various powerful skills, and survive for a certain time to pass the level.
  • Upgrade attributes, purchase powers or inscriptions after each level to match your combat style.
  • The unique WuXing (five elements) powers can be customized to produce powerful magical effects.
For example,Mutal can give power a chance to release a shadow attack, while Overcoming will extend the cooldown time of power but increase the damage.
Use your wisdom to arrange them as you like!

Highlights

  • Fight against hordes of enemies and release stress in fast-paced levels.
  • You only need to control the movement and sprint. You can enjoy the game with one hand.
  • Gorgeous and cool power effects, exciting combat scenes.
  • Many different enemies and bosses with different challenges.
  • Unique Power system - five elements of metal, fire, water, wood and earth, each with its own magical effect.
  • Hundreds of powers and inscription. Every run has its unique experience.

The game is currently in the Demo stage. There are still some features and contents under development.
If you have any good suggestions, please let us know via Discord or steam community.
